fullDescription.en: Enjoy an unforgettable tour with "One Day in Rio" and immerse yourself in the rich history of Rio de Janeiro. This full-day tour is ideal for families, couples, children and adults, offering a welcoming and pleasant atmosphere. Visit the iconic Christ the Redeemer, admire the tiles of SelarÃ³n Steps and explore the majestic Metropolitan Cathedral. With an experienced guide, you will have a complete and informative experience. The tour also includes passing by the Sambadrome and the entrance to the historic MaracanÃ£ stadium, plus an exciting ride to Sugarloaf Mountain, where stunning city views await you. During the tour, you will receive restaurant recommendations for a delicious and affordable lunch, ensuring you can enjoy the best of local cuisine without spending too much. This is a tour that combines history, religion, nature and incredible views, perfect for those who want to explore Rio de Janeiro comfortably and personalized. Don't miss the opportunity to experience all this in a single day with the safety and comfort of a specialized guide.

fullDescription.en: Discover the best of Rio on a full-day tour combining incredible tourist attractions in the multicultural 'wonderful city.' Visit Christ the Redeemer, Metropolitan Cathedral, SelarÃ³n Steps and make a quick stop in front of MaracanÃ£ Stadium. Enjoy lunch at a buffet restaurant with barbecue and visit AquaRio and the Ferris Wheel. We start with a visit to Christ the Redeemer, one of the new 7 wonders of the modern world. Then we head to the Metropolitan Cathedral, where in 1980 Pope John Paul II received 20,000 faithful standing. Next we visit SelarÃ³n Steps and its 215 steps with nearly 8,000 tiles placed by Chilean artist Jorge SelarÃ³n. We pass by MaracanÃ£ Stadium and Sambadrome. Enjoy lunch at a churrascaria and then make a photo stop in front of the Museum of Tomorrow and head to AquaRio, South America's largest aquarium. If tourists wish, they can visit the Wax Museum paying an entrance fee. The visit lasts about 30 minutes. The Ferris Wheel is 88 meters tall and takes 18 to 20 minutes to complete a full rotation. Each cabin holds 6 people.

A primeira parada Ã© no Cristo Redentor, subindo o morro do Corcovado, que fica a 710m acima do nÃ­vel do mar, garantindo uma vista panorÃ¢mica, contemplando a zona sul e parte da zona norte e centro do Rio de Janeiro. fullDescription.en: The tour starts at 8am. The first stop is Christ the Redeemer, ascending Corcovado hill at 710m above sea level, offering panoramic views contemplating the south zone and parts of the north zone and downtown Rio de Janeiro. Next, we head to Sugarloaf Mountain at 396m above sea level, taking the cable car ride operating since 1912, the first inaugurated in the southern hemisphere and the third in the world. The tour starts and ends in Copacabana, lasting approximately 6 hours. Attraction tickets are included.
fullDescription.es: El paseo comienza a las 8h. La primera parada es Cristo Redentor, subiendo el morro del Corcovado a 710m sobre el nivel del mar, garantizando vistas panorÃ¡micas contemplando la zona sur y partes de la zona norte y centro de RÃ­o de Janeiro. Luego vamos al Pan de AzÃºcar a 396m sobre el nivel del mar, haciendo el paseo en telefÃ©rico que opera desde 1912, el primero inaugurado en el hemisferio sur y el tercero del mundo. El paseo comienza y termina en Copacabana, con duraciÃ³n aproximada de 6 horas. Entradas a las atracciones incluidas.

fullDescription.it: Il tour inizia alle 8. Prima fermata Cristo Redentore, salendo il morro del Corcovado a 710m sul livello del mare, garantendo vista panoramica sulla zona sud e parti della zona nord e centro di Rio de Janeiro. Successivamente andiamo al Pan di Zucchero a 396m sul livello del mare, facendo il giro in funivia operativa dal 1912, la prima inaugurata nell'emisfero sud e la terza al mondo. Il tour inizia e termina a Copacabana, durata approssimativa di 6 ore. Biglietti attrazioni inclusi.

fullDescription.en: Come discover the historic and bohemian Lapa and Santa Teresa regions. The 6-hour tour includes a visit to Rio de Janeiro's Metropolitan Cathedral, Lapa Arches, SelarÃ³n Steps and a tram ride in Santa Teresa. Santa Teresa's iconic tram passes through Lapa Arches, the largest structure built by slaves when Brazil was a Portuguese colony. You'll have the opportunity to walk through the neighborhood, see works by local artists and even buy some. The Metropolitan Cathedral, with its modern architecture, holds 8,000 people, but miraculously during Pope John Paul II's visit in 1981, 20,000 people stood to see and hear the Polish Pope. SelarÃ³n Steps, with nearly 8,000 colorful tiles across 125 meters and 215 steps, is Rio's third most visited tourist spot, featured in Snoop Dogg's video clip and U2's.

fullDescription.en: Come walk with us through Olympic Boulevard, stopping for photos in front of Museum of Tomorrow, Museum of Art Rio, Kobra's ethnic mural tribute to 2016 Olympics (Guinness record) and visit AquaRio, Rio's Marine Aquarium (~1h visit); Wax Museum (~30min) and Ferris Wheel (88m tall, 20min full rotation with option for extra turn). It's a relaxed walk in Rio's port area, perfect for great social media photos! **Optional costs: (Wax Museum and Ferris Wheel)**

Es un paseo tranquilo por zona portuaria RÃ­o, ideal para fotos virales en redes! **Costos opcionales: (Museo de Cera y Rueda Gigante)**

fullDescription.it: Vieni a passeggiare con noi sul Boulevard Olimpico, sosta foto davanti Museo del Domani, Museo d'Arte Rio, murales etnico Kobra omaggio Olimpiadi 2016 (record Guinness) e visita AquaRio, Acquario Marino Rio (~1h); Museo della Cera (~30min) e Ruota Panoramica (88m altezza, 20min giro completo con opzione extra). Passeggiata tranquilla nella zona portuale Rio, perfetta per foto social! **Costi opzionali: (Museo della Cera e Ruota Panoramica)**
fullDescription.al: Komm mit uns spazieren auf Olympic Boulevard, Foto-Stopp vor Museum von Morgen, Rio-Kunst-Museum, Kobra's ethnisches Wandbild zu Olympia 2016 (Guinness-Rekord) und besuche AquaRio, Rio-Meerwasser-Aquarium (~1h); Wachsfigurenmuseum (~30min) und Riesenrad (88m hoch, 20min volle Drehung mit Extra-Option). Entspannter Spaziergang im Hafenviertel Rio, ideal fÃ¼r Social-Media-Fotos! **Optionale Kosten: (Wachsfigurenmuseum und Riesenrad)**

fullDescription.en: Come with us to visit Rio de Janeiro Botanical Garden, created by King JoÃ£o VI when the Portuguese royal family came to Brazil in 1808. A large green area with trees in full contact with nature, in the middle of the city, with over 8,000 trees including Brazilwood, Victoria Amazonica, and the facade of the Museum of Fine Arts. Chance to see small monkeys and take the classic photo in the Imperial Palms corridor. The tour lasts 4 hours. Transport and tickets not included.

fullDescription.en: Floresta da Tijuca is Brazil's first federal park and the most visited. Before reaching the Park, we'll see from above SÃ£o Conrado Beach and Pedra da GÃ¡vea, 850m tall, the world's largest monolith overlooking the sea. In this tour, you'll hike three trails, take photos of Taunay Waterfall (35m high), the exterior of Mayrink Chapel, have chances to see coatis, small monkeys and hear nature sounds within Rio de Janeiro city. Trails are easy level. We'll visit the Visitor Center telling the park's history and why preserve nature. See an adult Brazilwood tree. Then pass by Emperor's Table and stop at Chinese View for South Zone Rio photos.

shortDescription.pt-BR: Venha conosco conhecer o Cristo Redentor, o ponto turÃ­stico mais visitado do Brasil, escolhido PatrimÃ´nio da Humanidade pela Unesco e eleito desde 2006 uma das novas Sete Maravilhas do Mundo Moderno, em nosso tour com um guia altamente especializado. fullDescription.pt-BR: Descubra o Cristo Redentor, eleito desde 2006 uma das novas Sete Maravilhas do Mundo Moderno em uma visita guiada. Pegue um trem ao longo da Estrada de Ferro do Corcovado, que estÃ¡ em operaÃ§Ã£o hÃ¡ mais de 140 anos, subindo pela Floresta da Tijuca, a maior floresta urbana do mundo. No topo do Morro do Corcovado, a 710 metros acima do nÃ­vel do mar, veja o Cristo Redentor e admire a vista da cidade do Rio de Janeiro e da BaÃ­a de Guanabara, em um cenÃ¡rio que foi palco de muitos filmes conhecidos e sempre visitado por celebridades mundiais. Em seguida, faÃ§a um passeio pela cidade visitando a Escadaria SelarÃ³n, o terceiro ponto turÃ­stico mais visitado do Rio. Com quase 8.000 azulejos em seus 125 metros de comprimento e 215 degraus, foi cenÃ¡rio do videoclipe Beautiful do rapper americano Snoop Dogg e da banda irlandesa U2. Visite a Catedral Metropolitana do Rio de Janeiro (onde em 1980 vinte mil pessoas viram e ouviram em pÃ© a pregaÃ§Ã£o do Papa JoÃ£o Paulo II), a entrada principal do MaracanÃ£ com a estÃ¡tua de Bellini (primeiro capitÃ£o da seleÃ§Ã£o campeÃ£ de 1958), passamos pelo SambÃ³dromo e depois retornaremos ao ponto de encontro.
fullDescription.en: Discover Christ the Redeemer, elected since 2006 one of the new Seven Wonders of the Modern World on a guided visit. Take the train along Corcovado Railroad, operating for over 140 years, climbing through Floresta da Tijuca, the world's largest urban forest. At the top of Corcovado Hill, 710m above sea level, see Christ the Redeemer and admire the view of Rio de Janeiro city and Guanabara Bay, a setting for many famous movies and always visited by world celebrities. Then city tour visiting SelarÃ³n Steps, Rio's 3rd most visited spot. With nearly 8,000 tiles in its 125m length and 215 steps, it was the setting for Snoop Dogg's 'Beautiful' video and U2. Visit Rio Metropolitan Cathedral (where in 1980 twenty thousand people stood to see and hear Pope John Paul II preach), MaracanÃ£ main entrance with Bellini statue (1958 winning team first captain), pass by SambÃ³dromo and return to meeting point.
fullDescription.es: Descubre Cristo Redentor, elegido desde 2006 una de las nuevas Siete Maravillas del Mundo Moderno en visita guiada. Toma tren por Estrada de Ferro do Corcovado, funcionando +140 aÃ±os, subiendo Floresta da Tijuca, mayor bosque urbano mundo.
